name: Monster Grind
description:
This is a clicker-esque game where you must fight creatures through varying locations, gaining gold to upgrade your attack and defense. Once the final creature is defeated the game ends. This was a prototype that I made when I was learning about spreadsheets and balancing character/enemy stats.

How to Play:

Use the dropdowns to select a location and creature to fight

Click on fight to fight creatures

Use gold to upgrade attack and defense

Upon killing a creature, you will gain extra health for the next fight.
